channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Singapore University of Technology and Design on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: MotionLab: Unified Human Motion Generation and Editing via the Motion-Condition-Motion Paradigm
item.description: MotionLab: One framework to rule them all! Unifying human motion generation & editing via a novel Motion-Condition-Motion paradigm, boosting efficiency and generalization.

item.title: The Jumping Reasoning Curve? Tracking the Evolution of Reasoning Performance in GPT-[n] and o-[n] Models on Multimodal Puzzles
item.description: GPT models’ multimodal reasoning abilities are tracked over time on challenging visual puzzles, revealing surprisingly steady improvement and cost trade-offs.

item.title: TangoFlux: Super Fast and Faithful Text to Audio Generation with Flow Matching and Clap-Ranked Preference Optimization
item.description: TANGOFLUX: Blazing-fast, high-fidelity text-to-audio generation using novel CLAP-Ranked Preference Optimization.

item.title: M-Longdoc: A Benchmark For Multimodal Super-Long Document Understanding And A Retrieval-Aware Tuning Framework
item.description: M-LongDoc: a new benchmark and retrieval-aware tuning framework revolutionizes multimodal long document understanding, improving model accuracy by 4.6%.
